TopicTitle: [0.23.5] Fr3aKy's Part Pack V1.0 - Ariane 6 replica, extendable Engines and more...

Articles.Content:
NEW PROJECT! Take a look!

Hey and welcome to my first Mod " Fr3aKy'sPartPack "

So today is an awesome day and also the Release of the V1.0 of my Modpack. Yeah!

For the jubilee of V1.0 i have thinks about a replica of a Rocket and i cause........................................ the upcoming Ariane 6 Launcher!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Note: the fairing is not Included!

Stats from all Parts:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Effects from the old Parts:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

If you like the Effects and haven't these on your Stock Engines Download the Full Version of the HotRockets! Particle FX Replacement by Nazari1382!

Download from Curse

Download from Mediafire

Changelog:

V1.0:-------------------------------------------------

Adding HotRockets! Effects for all/upcoming Rocket Engines

Adding possible names, prices to the Parts

Adding a 3.75m to 2.5m Vinci Engine

V0.75:-----------------------------------------------

Adding an 1.25m nuklear Vinci Engine

Adding Heat(emissive) Effects for upcoming Engines

V0.5:------------------------------------------------

Adding Fairing for upcoming Engines

Adding a 2.5m Vinci Engine

First Version. First Mod!

Planned Feature:

-i think i going to do in the future fewer rocket engines!

-but i want to do more fuel Tanks, solar panels, Solid Boosters and maybe SAS, Batterys, Launch Clamps or other Cool Stuff!

(Feedback is very welcome! If you have wishes report that me!)

If you found a bug report that to me too, Don't be afraid! I'm sorry if I need a long time for my Parts it take a long time to make a part (First Mod!) but i getting faster!

special thanks to blackheart612 for the support!

Edited September 18, 2014 by Fr3aKyHDx
Release V1.0
Cool that looks great! A quick request: A F1 engine with around 5000KN of thrust? 3.75M?
haha ok i have written it down!

Isp of 450? That's higher than any other non-nuclear engine I've ever seen in KSP...

Do want.

That's a really cool concept, allows you to compact your rockets more, need more of these types of things that allow you to stow or compact the engines for travel and then fold out from the sides (think Phoenix from Star Trek) or like this where the thrust "cone"(not sure if that is the right term, lol don't care too) can be collapsed within the realm of believability. Nice work
I really like it! Big potencial!

Could you do an RL-10 lookalike (either Atlas-style A4 or Delta-style B2)? It'd work great as a 1.25m extendable nozzle engine. Also, do you think you could get a better particle effect for it? There's a whole new engine module (ModuleEnginesFX, that's what NASA pack uses) you can use to get a faint, orange flame you'd want on that engine (the real hydroLOX engines look like that).

Also, that's the best first model I've ever seen. I love extendable nozzle engines.

"MaverickSawyer" i think 450 ips are ok because of the large nozzle but I will think about it ^^

Thanks you, for your great opinions!
I have written all suggestions down. Tomorrow I'll look at one and will start instantly.

Nice work man, very innovative! Hope to see this applied to more than just rockets! Maybe a jet with dynamic nozzles, or maybe some rcs blocks that retract into the rocket/spaceplane body for more aerodynamic profiles would be awesome things to see...
This looks AMAZING!
Nice, reminds me of the H-10B on the Delta IV DCSS. Good work.
At first I'm like "wow what would I use that for" and then I realized that it would make my rockets shorter as to prevent them from spontaneously doing the worm.

You can show off your album directly by doing this:

[imgur ]uPdWD[/imgur ]

Just remove the space
I don't normally get excited about engines but this deserves some time tomorrow to look at. Kudos!

Hello everybody, nice to see that the Vinci finally found it's way ingame. Looks amazing.

I worked on a 1.25m version I called the "Hydra" a while ago, but never

finished it.

If someone wants to use the files I could send them.

ATM it looks like this in blender:

All the best

Edited May 9, 2014 by MWJ
Thank you blackheart for your great tip and your help
MWJ if you want i could finish your Rocket engine to a 1.25m and release it under your name i written you a pm! The Engine looks nice!
Hm, this is a nice part, and I didn't previously know about that engine, thanks! I'll give this a try at some point.

Very kerbal but whats the point of shape changing?

Edit: never mind i found out its to make it more compact during first stage flight

Edited May 9, 2014 by Xenon2462
realized the reason

I like the idea of "foldable" engines!

There should be more of these kind of rockets
New Update V0.75 with a new Atomic Engine!
Looks nice! I've never had much success with the fixed-nozzle NTRs, as they're so dang long, they make the rocket really wobbly. This should put a dent in that issue. Thank you much!
Amazing ... OMG this would work so well with my shuttle THANK YOU SO MUCH TAKE SOME REP

That looks very good, but the plate on the first one is kinda ugly, can you make one without that so i can use it on less then one meter tanks.

Also, the heat effect doesn't go onto the nozzle right, ask the guy who made the kosmos mod about that, he made an engine with that kind of nozzle and made that work somehow.
